channel.title: Marcos Barbero's Blog
channel.description: I create things and I blog about it... sometimes.

item.title: Multiple MongoDB connectors with Spring Boot
item.description: This tutorial will guide you in the process to connect to multiple MongoDBs. What you will build You will build an application that connects to multiple MongoDBs. Pre-req JDK 1.8 Text editor or your favorite IDE Maven 3.0+ MongoDB The sample project uses Project Lombok to generate getters, setters, contructors,...

item.title: Creating a batch service
item.description: This tutorial will guide you in the process to create a batch processing solution. What you will build You will build a service that imports a CSV spreadsheet, transform it in a Java object and stores in a SQL database. Pre-req JDK 1.8 Text editor or your favorite IDE Maven...
